themes: community healing through art and creativity
access to communal and shared spaces
key_phrases: venues and community members suffer when red tape starts breaking down potential community hotspots
more respect for the land you’re using
given to y’all out of heritage, slavery and war
too much trash and waste everywhere with zero effort or resources provided to remove it and repurpose it
potential community gardens, communal baths, open opportunity
encourage everyone to heal through art, creativity, and reconnecting with one’s roots
barriers_identified: red tape restricting development of community hotspots
lack of resources for trash and waste removal
neglect of land given through heritage and history
solutions_proposed: remove bureaucratic barriers to developing community spaces
provide resources to remove and repurpose trash and waste
create community gardens and communal baths
use reclaimed spaces for art, agriculture, and community healing
